wordpressPost.content:
The grower forms the basis for quality. He keeps a close eye on growth and health. Based on this, he takes correct action. Expertise and experience are therefore also prerequisites for enabling flowers to flourish.

 

LinFlowers employs professionals from a family business. They grew up in greenhouses and therefore know about the ins and outs of flowers.

However, experience alone is not enough. Responding to market developments, sustainability and new cultivations also requires inventiveness. So, in addition to being a grower we are also true entrepreneurs who ensure strong growth of our business.
